resultschain.column.popover.body.bot.act: The assumptions mean the baseline which is assumed to be there during the planning. For example we could assume that the partner churches are willing to co-operate and they welcome us.
resultschain.column.popover.body.bot.imp: The assumptions mean the circumstanses that allow the impact to happen on the global level.
resultschain.column.popover.body.bot.out: The assumptions mean the circumstanses that allow the outcome in a wider perspective to follow from the activities.
The assumptions mean the baseline which is assumed to be there during the planning. For example we should assume that certain resourses should be available so that the output can be created.
resultschain.column.popover.body.mid.act: The indicators should help you measure the success of your work. A good indicator is SMART (specific and measurable, achievable, relevant and time-bound).
resultschain.column.popover.body.mid.imp: Example: "The Fida personel have faciliated 50 missional trainings during the first year".
resultschain.column.popover.body.mid.out: Example: "The partner church has faciliated 10 missional trainings during the first year".
Example: "I have faciliated 4 missional trainings during the first year".
resultschain.column.popover.body.top.act: List down your action plan here. Descripe the activities clearly without going too deep into detail.
resultschain.column.popover.body.top.imp: The impact is usually more abstract and requires longer period of time to be able to see it. This is also what happens on the global scale.
resultschain.column.popover.body.top.out: The outcome should naturally follow on the higher level.
Output is the expected fruit we can harvest after compliting defined activitites.
resultschain.column.popover.title.top.ac: What do we mean by activities?
resultschain.column.popover.title.top.im: What do we mean by impact?
resultschain.column.popover.title.top.ou: What do we mean by outcome?
What do we mean by output?
